{{Description|The warriors of Natlan's six great tribes who fight for the honor and glory of their people.<br>Over long years of living and fighting alongside their [[Saurian]] companions, these tribal warriors have gradually acquired their traits and learned how to apply them on the field of battle.|[[Adventurer Handbook]]}}

'''Sauroform Tribal Warriors''' are an enemy group encountered in [[Natlan]].

Hailing from the [[Children of Echoes|Nanatzcayan]], [[People of the Springs|Meztli]], [[Scions of the Canopy|Huitztlan]], [[Flower-Feather Clan|Tlalocan]], [[Masters of the Night-Wind|Mictlan]], and [[Collective of Plenty|Teotecan]] tribes, all warriors are capable of inflicting {{Color|[[Physical|Physical DMG]]}} and their tribe's corresponding Elemental DMG.

==Types==
===Tribe Guards===
Tribe guards have relatively low HP and ATK and primarily deal {{Color|Physical DMG}}. However, all tribe guards are capable of using a special attack that deals Elemental DMG matching their tribe's element.
* {{Enemy|Flowing Blade Skirmisher}}
* {{Enemy|Flowing Blade Grease-Saw}}
* {{Enemy|Flowing Blade Harpoon-Thrower}}
* {{Enemy|Forged Sand Interrogator}}
* {{Enemy|Forged Sand Shieldbreaker}}
* {{Enemy|Forged Sand Javelineer}}
* {{Enemy|Swiftstep Seeker}}
* {{Enemy|Swiftstep Storm Scout}}
* {{Enemy|Swiftstep Armed Courier}}
* {{Enemy|Winged Warrior: Skysoarer}}
* {{Enemy|Winged Warrior: Feathershedder}}
* {{Enemy|Winged Warrior: Skymaster}}
* {{Enemy|Spiritspeaker Warrior: Determinator}}
* {{Enemy|Spiritspeaker Warrior: Psychokinetic}}
* {{Enemy|Spiritspeaker Warrior: Contemplator}}
* {{Enemy|Ferocious Warrior: Human Ram}}
* {{Enemy|Ferocious Warrior: Wrestler}}
* {{Enemy|Ferocious Warrior: Grappler}}

===Saurian-Crowned Warriors===
Saurian-Crowned warriors have higher HP and ATK and are capable of dealing both {{Color|Physical DMG}} and Elemental DMG matching their tribe's element.
* {{Enemy|Koholasaurus Warrior: Waveshuttler}}
* {{Enemy|Koholasaurus Warrior: Reefsplitter}}
* {{Enemy|Tepetlisaurus Warrior: Shard Striker}}
* {{Enemy|Tepetlisaurus Warrior: Rockbreaker Blade}}
* {{Enemy|Yumkasaurus Warrior: Whirling Leaves}}
* {{Enemy|Yumkasaurus Warrior: Flowing Skyfire}}
* {{Enemy|Qucusaurus Warrior: Heartstar Hammer}}
* {{Enemy|Qucusaurus Warrior: Blazing Sky}}
* {{Enemy|Iktomisaurus Warrior: Icy Tidebearer}}
* {{Enemy|Iktomisaurus Warrior: Cryocrystal Cannon}}
* {{Enemy|Tatankasaurus Warrior: Skybreaker}}
* {{Enemy|Tatankasaurus Warrior: Spiritlight Chaser}}

===Normal Bosses===
* {{Enemy|Wayward Hermetic Spiritspeaker}}
